subject: Golf
Weather
Hurricanes and Tropical Storms
Earthquakes
Hurricane Irene (2011)
lead_paragraph: With a first round already hampered by rain and bad weather expected over the weekend, there is a chance the tournament, the first event in the FedEx Cup playoffs, could be shortened to 54 holes.
snippet: With a first round already hampered by rain and bad weather expected over the weekend, there is a chance the tournament, the first event in the FedEx Cup playoffs, could be shortened to 54 holes.
